phrases: Yukio still has not come back.
He has not come home and does not even bother to call...
There was that hostage incident two days ago, right?
They have called in the principal to take responsibility for it.
That is why the Academy is closed for now.
We cannot even enter the school buildings.
The leaders of the Vatican have been replaced and a new pope was elected.
Does it have anything to do with the dismissal of the principal?
Anyway, things here are going to change a lot.
Not just with the Exorcist cram school but the whole Order as well.
The Exorcist cram school and the Japanese Branch as a whole
have been placed under direct control of the Vatican.
I am the newly assigned Head of the Japanese Branch, Yukio Okumura.
He is the same Middle First Class as I.
In addition to accepting the position of the Branch leader,
I have also received the title of Paladin as of today.
And also Head of the Japanese Branch.
I wonder what this new pope is thinking.
Dammit, he got ahead of me!
I wanted to be the first to become Paladin!
Have you ever gotten even close to my level?
Are you really the new Paladin?
I have the title of the strongest Exorcist, just like Father had.
You are my little brother and I know that you work your ass off when no one's looking,
but why did not you tell me something this important?!
Then at least send me an e-mail!
I will do that next time.
The only reason I have been appointed Paladin
is so I could carry out the plan of the Vatican.
Our whole history we have lived in fear of the demons.
Just as the light of civilization drove away the darkness,
we shall drive away all the demons from this world
and return Assiah to the hands of humankind once again!
I, Pope Ernst, hereby order all Exorcists around the world.
I am responsible for carrying out that plan.
You will help us too, will not you Rin?
I am off to a meeting now.
Demon slayer weapons developed by the Vatican.
It takes the power of the defeated demon and boosts your Exorcism.
When I hold this in my hand I feel like fighting too.
Shima, it is not a toy...
We are supposed to be Tamers...
We will rather stick with these.
Although you are permitted to carry arms, you still lack experience.
Be careful not to get in the way of other Exorcists.
O Sylphs born of the dark mist.
gather in the lands of honey and milk.
Spread your crystalline wings and dance in the sky!
To me it feels we are...
We have already completed cleansing 443 556 regions,
but we are facing resistance in a number of other regions...
Tell every single Exorcist that this is a Crusade.
Without sacrifices our dreams will never come true.
Is there something you would like to say?
Will you turn Rin back to human?
The Kurikara has sealed Rin's blue flames into Gehenna.
The human world of Assiah and the demon world of Gehenna
are like the two sides of a mirror.
If we destroy Gehenna as a whole, all demonic power will be gone,
and Rin will return to an ordinary human.
It is impossible to destroy Gehenna.
We have spent 15 years to develop the ultimate weapon, the Messiah.
The Messiah can be launched anytime on my command,
but the Gehenna Gate needs to be opened first.
It literally is a gate in space-time between Assiah and Gehenna.
It is believed that only Satan can open it, but we managed to create an artificial one.
To maintain the Gate for a longer time, we need immense amounts of demon blood.
Can Rin really become human again if we destroy Gehenna?
Not only Rin, but you as well.
Did you think I am not aware of your secret, my grandson?
Hey guys, what are you eating?
We got yours too while there were some left.
Do not worry, you will get some too.
How can you even think about eating?
You will pay for this, humans.
We have protected this forest for over 2000 years!
He is the Lord of this forest?
He was the Lord of this forest!
He was just angry because we killed his kin!
I am ordered to eliminate every demon from this world.
What about Blackie and Ukobach and Izumo's Gods of Harvest?
Are you saying you are going to kill them too?!
We must get rid of every single demon.
Do you really want to kill every demon there is?
What did you do to him?
Take Rin Okumura to the Vatican Headquarters immediately.
You said the checkups all returned negative!
It is none of your business.
If this plan succeeds we all will be saved.
I have the authority to lock you up too!
's a type of demon swords that be suckin' human blood.
I check'd the photo ye sent me'n' it seems t' have been possess'd by a certain count in Transylvania.
Why are they making us use this kind of stuff?
What makes ye think I would know?
Anyway, jus' try t' use'them as lil' as possible.
This shit just does not feel right.
He is in charge of this so if I ask he should tell me something.
As if he would tell you anything.
You would better look for a more talkative professor.
This is the lowest level of the Vatican Headquarters,
and this prison is often called the Cocytus.
It surprises me greatly to meet you here.
Pray tell me the details of how you ended up here?
And he engaged in a demon hunt...
So why are you locked up?
I, Johann Faust, was immersed in the most advanced branch of science of the time, artificial life research.
I totally cannot see the resemblance...
When the Vatican forbid every aspect of creating life,
I left my laboratory to my students,
but apparently they continued my line of research.
The laboratory is located in Poland.
Neuhaus is the student of my student's student, and so on and so forth.
Professor Neuhaus said that someone revived his wife.
Most likely that someone set a trap for him.
Someone who dislikes me, of course.
Thank you for the important information.
It is about time I take my leave.
Can you not hear the bells signaling the start of the play?
I have no intention to miss a moment of this wonderful show.
Then, if I may beg your pardon.
You and Bourguignon are to bolster the defence.
No one may interrupt the ceremony we will be performing.
Now that I meet you in person I see the resemblance to Yuri is even greater.
Nice to meet you, my grandson.
He was supposed to be kept safe until the Exorcist Authorization Exam...
Ah well, the Headquarters are in chaos as well.
We are waiting for Branch Head Okumura's commands as well.
I do not know that, but I heard the execution will be carried out at the top of the True Cross Academy.
What the hell are you planning?
This is the wood of the cross on which hung the Saviour of the world...
Ye people: what have I made you
or in what have I offended you?
O Immortal saint, have mercy on us.
This is the wood of the cross on which hung the Saviour of the world...
Show us the Gates of Hell!
Return to your stations right away.
The plan is being carried out right now.
For the kin of Satan just being alive is a sin!
Is that what the Order of the True Cross calls justice?
The orders of the Vatican are absolute.
If you intend to oppose me, I shall strike you down.
Too bad you side with the demons.
I just cannot stand the shine of your bald head.
What is the meaning of this?
What are you doing to Rin?
I am sacrificing him to open the Gehenna Gate.
You promised that you would turn him human again, so...
He will be remembered forever as the hero who destroyed Gehenna!
Look, the Gehenna Gate opened the way for Armageddon!!
The King of Demons shall burn Hell itself with those flames!
These brothers are like the two sides of a mirror.
Had he not drawn the Demon-Slaying Blade that day,
their fate would have been different.
Even I am excited to see what is coming!
The school is temporarily closed today.
It is alright kokoro ni mo nai
sakete toorenai michi wa itsu kara ka konna datta
haite suteru hodo ni taikutsu datta
kizu darake ni natte try for pride
haite sutete mo kekkyoku taisetsu nanda
harewatari michi ni hikari wa sashita
Let us fight osore wa nai
Dark side in my heart is
the unerasable sadness of the past.
It is alright if I do not really mean it,
so I fire my blasters and stretch out my hands.
Since when has my way been unavoidable like this?
And now there is no one left...
I cry for my pride, I cannot bear it.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
An aria of love resounding through
this distorted reality of twisted prayers.
My dreams and tomorrow are collapsing,
because throwing away the lies would be boring.
try it for your pride, covered in wounds.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
Even so, I sing the song of love and
let its wish reach through this distorted world
to build our bonds and the tomorrow to come.
Throwing away the lies was important after all,
because this is my precious life.
Dark cloud in my heart is
disappearing and light is shining on the road I am on.
Let us fight, there is no fear.
mau chou no you ni hirari
koko wa dokoka betsu no sekai
juudaina ayamachi ni mo kizukazu ni
hito kara hito e to tsunagaru
totemo kirei de maru de kinu no ito
kore ga unmei to iu kusari nano ka
I am lightly fluttering in wondrous light
like a dancing butterfly in midair.
Is this place in another world?
My fall is not slowing down so
The numbers that make my head spin
and there I notice a terrible error.
is a shining pale indigo blue wire.
It is beautiful like a thread of silk.
I wonder if it is what they call the chains of fate?
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in this
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in it.
